pageContent: Purpose of review: The goal of this paper was to review the novel treatment modality of high-intensity transurethral directional ultrasound for prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Editorial Comment to Health-related quality of life after salvage high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) treatment for locally radiorecurrent prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21771104/
